item.title: The Beginning
item.description: Chapter 1 So, I completed my bachalor’s degree and master’s degree by the year 2018. Collage days were fun, I miss them sometimes. After that, I got job in the field of AI (Artificial Intelligence). This field is/was totally new to me but it’s interesting. This AI (deep Learning) are nothing more then some Statistical model which can help the machine work like human brain (its tries to, not perfect yet.
